short-description: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.
title: Archer

short-description: An average high school student and his best friend get caught up in some trouble causing him to receive a werewolf bite. As a result they find themselves in the middle of all sorts of dramas in Becan Hills.
title: Teen Wolf

short-description: This ABC show takes place in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania in the 1980s and follows the lives of a family named The Goldbergs.
title: Les Goldberg

short-description: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.
title: Castle

short-description: The random escapades of Stan Smith, a conservative C.I.A. Agent dealing with family life, and keeping America safe, all in the most absurd way possible.
title: American Dad!

short-description: LeBron James and several other NBA All-Stars team up with the Looney Tunes for this long-awaited sequel.
title: Space Jam 2

short-description: Dr. Frasier Crane moves back to his hometown of Seattle, where he lives with his father, and works as a radio psychiatrist.
title: Frasier

short-description: A newly sober single mom tries to pull her life together in Napa Valley while dealing with her wayward mother.
title: Mom

short-description: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.
title: Kingsman: Le cercle d'or

short-description: The early life of child genius Sheldon Cooper, later seen in
title: Young Sheldon

short-description: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.
title: Mère incontrôlable à la fac

short-description: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.
title: Carnage chez les Puppets

short-description: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.
title: L'espion qui m'a larguée

short-description: Halloween comes to life in a comedy adventure based on R.L. Stine's 400-million-selling series of books.
title: Chair de Poule 2: Les Fantômes d'Halloween

short-description: Based on the true story of
title: Le loup de Wall Street

short-description: A group of ambitious misfits try to escape the harsh realities of high school by joining a glee club.
title: Glee

short-description: Al Bundy is a misanthropic women's shoe salesman with a miserable life. He hates his job, his wife is lazy, his son is dysfunctional (especially with women), and his daughter is dim-witted and promiscuous.
title: Mariés, deux enfants

short-description: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.
title: Bob l'éponge

short-description: When
title: The Disaster Artist

short-description: Follows the struggle of Richard Hendricks, a Silicon Valley engineer trying to build his own company called Pied Piper.
title: Silicon Valley

short-description: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.
title: Contrôle parental

short-description: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.
title: The Ranch

short-description: When a plane crashes on a deserted island on the way to Thailand, the remaining survivors of the crash struggle to get along and heads clash as they have differing views on how to stay alive and how they will get off the island.
title: Wrecked

short-description: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
title: H2G2: le guide du voyageur galactique

short-description: An exploratory ship from Earth faces intergalactic challenges 300 years in the future.
title: The Orville

short-description: While transporting a dying man to the hospital, two paramedics find a million dollars in cash sewn into his clothing. When the man dies, they decide to keep it, setting them on a path for a hellish night of violence and mayhem.
title: Danger One

short-description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.
title: L'île aux chiens

short-description: When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.
title: Chuck

short-description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
title: Retour vers le futur

short-description: After being mistaken for younger than she really is, a single mother decides to take the chance to reboot her career and her love life as a 26-year old.
title: Younger

short-description: A novice sleuth is hired by the police after he cons them into thinking he has psychic powers which help solve crimes. With the assistance of his reluctant best friend, the duo take on a series of complicated cases.
title: Enquêteur malgré lui

short-description: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?
title: Moi, belle et jolie

short-description: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.
title: Hocus Pocus: Les trois sorcières

short-description: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.
title: Ferdinand

short-description: Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.
title: Desperate Housewives

short-description: A mother of three hires a night nanny to help with her newborn.
title: Tully

short-description: The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.
title: M.A.S.H.

short-description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
title: Vaiana, la légende du bout du monde

short-description: Decades after their 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament bout, a middle-aged Daniel LaRusso and Johnny Lawrence find themselves martial-arts rivals again.
title: Cobra Kai

short-description: BULL stars Michael Weatherly as Dr. Jason Bull in a drama inspired by the early career of Dr. Phil McGraw, the founder of one of the most prolific trial consulting firms of all time. ...
title: Bull

short-description: A humorous take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.
title: Holmes and Watson

short-description: Four previously married women live together in Miami, sharing their various experiences together and enjoying themselves despite hard times.
title: Les craquantes

short-description: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.
title: Boku no Hero Academia

short-description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists' find that their lives will never be the same.
title: Tous en scène

short-description: The regulars of the Boston bar Cheers share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.
title: Cheers

short-description: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.
title: Juliet, Naked

short-description: Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.
title: Big Mouth

short-description: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends, and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.
title: Love, Simon

short-description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.
title: SOS Fantômes

short-description: Will and Grace live together in an apartment in New York City. He's a gay lawyer, she's a straight interior designer. Their best friends are Jack, a gleeful but proud gay man, and Karen, a charismatic, filthy rich, amoral socialite.
title: Will & Grace
